writings.text: 朱に交われば赤くなる

readings.text: しゅにまじわればあかくなる

furigana.writing: 朱に交われば赤くなる
furigana.reading: しゅにまじわればあかくなる

glossary: people will take on the characteristics of those who surround them
spend time with the wise and you will become wise, but the friends of fools will suffer
when mixing with vermillion, one becomes red
